page.title: 13NYMANS GARDENS
page.content: Nymans gardens is in Handcross and it is a wonderful place.There are many different types of trees,flowers and plants.There is the ruins of Lady Ross's house which was half burnt down in 1947. There is also a fountain made out of red stone which is very nice to look at.There are many different varieties of azalea and rhododendron as well as arbutus.Lots of people go to Nymans and find it very interesting .It is a very popular place because there is so much to look at.It is open to the public from April to November. It also belongs to the National Trust.
